errors.error_description: Missing Python version requirement specification in installation section
correction_candidates: Clone this repository. SpiceEV just has an optional dependency on Matplotlib. Everything else uses the Python (>= 3.6) standard library.
Clone this repository. SpiceEV requires Python 3.6 or higher and has an optional dependency on Matplotlib.
Clone this repository. SpiceEV is compatible with Python versions 3.6+ with optional Matplotlib dependency.
Clone this repository. SpiceEV needs Python >= 3.6 and optionally Matplotlib for plotting functionality.
errors.golden_answer: Clone this repository. SpiceEV just has an optional dependency on Matplotlib. Everything else uses the Python (>= 3.6) standard library.
